about_the_game:
Welcome to Dungeon Mana, where controlling Mana is the key to survival!

In this turn-based roguelite RPG, each run is unique: characters are randomly generated with different skills, and your mission is to choose up to three heroes to face a series of intense battles.

The combat revolves around managing three colors of mana: red, blue, and green. Each mana choice affects your characters' attacks, creating dynamic and diverse strategies in every battle. After each victory, you’ll earn rewards to enhance your heroes, building a unique deck. Face challenging battles and prepare for the epic showdown with the final boss! Each run increases the difficulty and pushes the mana control to new levels.

Master the mana and conquer the dungeons!

Turn-Based Mana

In this game, strategy is key. Enjoy a turn-based combat system where players manage their energy with the most vital resource: Mana. Every action requires careful calculation to maximize your turn, ensuring intense and exciting battles. Think carefully, because controlling Mana could be the difference between victory and defeat.

Random Character Selection

In Dungeon Mana, each run presents a completely new set of randomly generated characters. With unique abilities and unexpected combinations, each choice is crucial for your success. No adventure is the same, as you never know which heroes will be at your disposal and how to best utilize their power in combat!

Select Your Path

In Dungeon Mana, your journey won’t be linear. After each battle, you’ll have to make strategic decisions, choosing between two paths, each with different biomes, enemies, and rewards. Will you face tougher challenges for greater rewards, or take the safer path with more moderate prizes? The choice is yours, and each decision will shape the course of your adventure!

Choose Your Rewards Wisely

In Dungeon Mana, after each combat, you’ll face the tough task of choosing between different rewards. Each option can enhance your characters in various ways, but only one will suit your strategy best. The decisions you make will influence your success in upcoming battles.

Craft Items

In Dungeon Mana, crafting items is crucial to improving your strategies. As you progress, you’ll collect materials that allow you to create powerful items to help you in various battles. The key to success lies in what you can craft!

Unlockable Content and More!

As you advance, you’ll unlock additional content, from characters and skills to new biomes, enemies, and game modes. Every achievement and completed challenge brings you closer to a host of surprises that will keep players engaged over time.

Multi-language

The game is designed so everyone can enjoy it, regardless of their language. With support for multiple languages, you can fully immerse yourself in the experience without language barriers. Epic adventures await players worldwide!

  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4850 or NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
